Overview Â¶ The economy of Vekllei is a sparkling jewel of its crown of contradictions, and totally unique in the world today. V ekllei language, abbreviated to just Vekllei, has six core sublanguages that are used commonly today.

Overview Â¶ The language of Vekllei is an important part of the project. Utopianism cascades through every part of society, and rethinking communication is a foundational part of that instinct.

item.title: Religion
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-red); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-red); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-red); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-red); } Religion in Vekllei d ARTICLE Documents ðŸ”” This article is about Vekllei 1. Overview Â¶ Upen is the nondenominational animistic spiritualism of Vekllei. It is both an organised religious belief system and a decentralised local animism, localised regionally across the Home Islands and beyond.
